de.mpg.biochem.mars.image

Class PeakShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpg.biochem.mars.molecule.AbstractJsonConvertibleRecord
      • de.mpg.biochem.mars.image.PeakShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonConvertibleRecord

    public class PeakShape
extends AbstractJsonConvertibleRecord
    Stores shape information for objects as 2D polygons. Extends AbstractJsonConvertibleRecord to allow for saving to file as JSON. Provides utility methods to sample inside the shape, calculate the area and center position as well as Peak generation method. Peaks contain references to PeakShape for recovery of shape after tracking using the center position.
    Author:
    Karl Duderstadt

    • Method Detail

      • toPolygonX

        public double[] toPolygonX(double calibration,
                           double xcorner,
                           double xcenter,
                           double magnification)
        Returns a new int array containing the X pixel coordinates to which to paint this polygon.
        Parameters:
        calibration - the pixel size in X, to convert physical coordinates to pixel coordinates.
        xcorner - the top-left X corner of the view in the image to paint.
        xcenter - the x coordinate of the Peak center.
        magnification - the magnification of the view.
        Returns:
        a new double array.

      • toPolygonY

        public double[] toPolygonY(double calibration,
                           double ycorner,
                           double ycenter,
                           double magnification)
        Returns a new int array containing the Y pixel coordinates to which to paint this polygon.
        Parameters:
        calibration - the pixel size in Y, to convert physical coordinates to pixel coordinates.
        ycorner - the top-left Y corner of the view in the image to paint.
        ycenter - the y coordinate of the Peak center.
        magnification - the magnification of the view.
        Returns:
        a new int array.
